attributes.action: Force Michael Martin to resign as Speaker of the House of Commons
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A petition calling for the Prime Minister to back the growing calls for the Michael Martin to resign as Speaker of the House of Commons immediately.

rejection.details: Speaker Michael Martin announced on May 19 he will step down in June.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
